loadFile

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> loadFile(java.lang.String filename)
Loads the text of the file whith the given filename. Retrieved from: https://www.greenfoot.org/scenarios/7647 9/6/2021

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file that should be loaded.
Returns:

saveFile

public boolean saveFile(java.lang.String filename,
                        boolean addToExistingFile,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileText)
Saves the Strings given as the second to the last parameter in the file named like given in filename. Retrieved from: https://www.greenfoot.org/scenarios/7647 9/6/2021

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file where the Strings should be saved.
addToExistingFile - If you want to add the text to an existing file this variable has to be true;
fileText - The strings that should be saved in the file as a list.
Returns:
Returns true if the file was successfully createt. False if not.
